subject: Jews
Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kaplowitz, a 6-foot-2-inch guard from the Bronx, joined a Knicks lineup in 1946 that included Ossie Schectman, Sonny Hertzberg, Jake Weber and Leo Gottlieb.
